title: #99: Further Profiling 13 Reasons Why
description:
The RCP team of Jim Clemente, Laura Richards and Lisa Zambetti examine episodes 7, 8 and 9 of 13 Reasons Why, discussing Hannah's privacy being violated after her diary was published and the dangerous "Bro Code."

New to Real Crime Profile? Never miss an episode by subscribing today at smarturl.it/realcrime

Check out www.youcannotbereplaced.com
